Articles.Content:
I have the same issue Doctor. Read the first page FAQ for instruction on what to do.

 

Mr.BD, here's my code:

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B3F2OTaJUZGmUmNseWZ4UjdGdWM&usp=sharing

this more like it?

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxjREdxJXnxvVllrV0Q2bm9PbEE/view?usp=sharing

I had fixed most of the code for KSP 1.1 and possible running. But, I don't know some code need to be change.

https://github.com/yaus/BDArmory/commit/88cbef20da86a144507db81742ab8b142962e3e8?diff=split

Please Help!

^ Me too!

Here's my "official" version for KSP 1.1 prerelease.  Go ahead and try it out.  Note that BDA Vessel Switcher is a separate plugin and has not been updated for comatibility yet.

https://github.com/BahamutoD/BDArmory/releases/tag/v0.11.0pre1

 

I did all the same changes as @YauS except I took out the overheat and reload bars temporarily since they were throwing runtime errors, and I fixed the audio falloff on audio sources.

 

Edited April 2, 2016 by BahamutoD

9 hours ago, BahamutoD said:

^ Me too!

Here's my "official" version for KSP 1.1 prerelease.  Go ahead and try it out.  Note that BDA Vessel Switcher is a separate plugin and has not been updated for comatibility yet.

https://github.com/BahamutoD/BDArmory/releases/tag/v0.11.0pre1

 

I did all the same changes as @YauS except I took out the overheat and reload bars temporarily since they were throwing runtime errors, and I fixed the audio falloff on audio sources.

 

Thanks for the real quick compatibility update, sometimes I love ya. I really wanna see how it performs now

and by the way, the issue that broke my explosions is still present in the code. Did you fix it your own way or (understandably) forget or even rather have a different plan for it?

Sooo.....nothing works. Tried installing it to a version with the mod, nothing shows up, tried it with a vanilla version, nothing. Anyone have that issue? The BD tab doesn't even show anymore, but the loading screen loads up that parts as the game's firing up.

Edit: Fired the mod into the gamedata as i did originally, and i'm still having the black-screen-load glitch, so at least it's consistently messing up.

Edited April 3, 2016 by Doctor Dimension

1 hour ago, Doctor Dimension said:

Sooo.....nothing works. Tried installing it to a version with the mod, nothing shows up, tried it with a vanilla version, nothing. Anyone have that issue? The BD tab doesn't even show anymore, but the loading screen loads up that parts as the game's firing up.

Edit: Fired the mod into the gamedata as i did originally, and i'm still having the black-screen-load glitch, so at least it's consistently messing up.

Are you running the 1.1 (pre)?
1.1 was the one that wouldn't show anything.
BahamutoD, it seems that you're recent test DLL makes the mouse cursor disappear in the game scene.

I have not begun using the newest version, however I got it working some how. But now i have another problem. I have built some more planes, and AA vehicles but now my weapons managers don't work completely. I can still fire weapons and so on, do everything normal as a player, but when I open the GUI to try and set it up for AI it says "No Weapon Manager found" despite the Weapons manager be connected directly to the main pod.

Neither versions I am using work, and I cannot seem to find any online aid, it seems people with the glitch are referred to forum after forum, but there's no real fix? Why is my game messed and how do I fix it?

@Doctor Dimension The log shows that it can't find the settings file.  Did you install it in the right place?  How are you launching KSP?  What operating system do you use?

@harpwner I haven't been working on BDA besides the minimal changes to attempt 1.1 compatibility.  I plan on continuing bug fixing, improvements, etc after 1.1 is stable and the current version of BDA is fully compatible with it.

@BahamutoD I followed the instructions and place the BDArmory folder from the DL's Gamedata into GameData>Squad. I launch KSP by going into the folder and clicking the .exe file. I'm using Windows 10.
@Doctor Dimension The BDArmory folder belongs in the GameData folder, not the Squad folder.
@BahamutoD so just in the GameData but not underneath that?
@Doctor Dimension
worked! Thanks!
Radar locking not work as well as before. I would try to fix it!!!!

3 hours ago, YauS said:

Radar locking not work as well as before. I would try to fix it!!!!

This is the problem of abnromal render of radar images. Original code only consider the Red color channel. Fix it by consider green color channel.

https://github.com/yaus/BDArmory/commit/0cba1a56155b40d312ff493184672567539e857f

 

Edited April 4, 2016 by YauS
Well, here is our first modern dogfight in BDArmory. Thanks @BahamutoD for an amazing series of mods you have put out, making this totally possible!

Amazing work!

I have a modding question, how did you make the flir targeter have that holo effect, it changes colour based on the direction you look at it from.

Thanks!
hey Baha….why not consider incorporating vessel switcher into BDA sense VS pretty much needs BDA to operate?

hey Baha….why not consider incorporating vessel switcher into BDA sense VS pretty much needs BDA to operate?

wouldnt be a bad idea
